verses.name: Matthew 10:22
verses.text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name’s sake: but he that endureth to the end shall be saved.

verses.name: Matthew 10:23
verses.text: But when they persecute you in this city, flee ye into another: for verily I say unto you, Ye shall not have gone over the cities of Israel, till the Son of man be come.

verses.name: Matthew 10:24
verses.text: The disciple is not above his master, nor the servant above his lord.
